div.span: With the right skills and strategies you can start making money even while you are in college. Learn high-paying freelance skills, build a portfolio that attracts clients, and land real projects that pay you.

button.class: bg-k-pinkish-orange border text-white py-3 mx-4 rounded-50 w-50 mt-3
bg-k-pinkish-orange border text-white py-3 mx-4 rounded-50 w-50 mt-3

div.style: box-shadow: 16px 16px 0px 0px #F70; border-radius: 40px; border: 2px solid #333; background: #FFE2C9; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center;

div.class: d-flex flex-column align-items-center icon-item justify-content-center p-2
div.span: Build a profitable side hustle without quitting your job.

div.class: d-flex flex-column align-items-center icon-item justify-content-center p-2
div.span: Learn high-demand skills that businesses actively pay for.

div.class: d-flex flex-column align-items-center icon-item justify-content-center p-2
div.span: Charge premium prices & avoid burnout while freelancing.

div.class: d-flex flex-column align-items-center icon-item justify-content-center p-2
div.span: Get proven strategies to land high-ticket clients.

div.div: What can an Individual Learn from this

div.span: List of High-Paying Skills
Choose the right skill and learn how to monetize it
Portfolio Building
Create work samples that impress clients (even if you're a beginner)
Client Acquisition
Learn how to find, pitch, and land high-paying clients
Networking & Outreach
Connect with the right people to get consistent work

div.p: We know how frustrating it can be to want to earn but not know where to start. That’s exactly why we created this course for students and beginners who want a clear, step-by-step path to freelancing success.

p.t: You’ll learn high-income skills that are in demand, how to build a portfolio that gets clients, and how to market yourself so opportunities come to you. This course will also guide you through pricing, payments, and networking—so you never have to undersell yourself.

img.style: max-width: 100%; height: auto; object-fit: cover; max-height: 400px;

div.class: w-60 p-5 pt-0 d-flex flex-column gap-3 lato_font justify-content-center

span.t: Freelancing can change your life, and we want to make sure you do it the right way. You will also get community access, where you can connect with like-minded freelancers, share experiences, and get ongoing support

div.style: max-width: 100%; width: 100vw; background-color: black; color: white;

ul.li: Introduction
What is freelancing & why it’s the best career option in 2025
Real earning potential: ₹10K/month → ₹1L/month roadmap
Who is this course for & what you’ll learn?
Freelancer Mindset & Soft Skills for Success
our First 30, 90 & 180 Days Roadmap

button.span: Module 2 : Choosing The Right Freelancing Skill

ul.li: High-paying vs. easy-to-learn skills
Fastest skills to start earning (in 30 days or less!)
Choosing the Right Skill Based on Your Personality & Interests
Deep dives into (Video Editing, AI Content Creation, Thumbnail Designing)

button.span: Module 3 : Building a Portfolio That Stands Out

ul.li: Creating a beginner-friendly but high-impact portfolio
Best tools & platforms for building your portfolio
What clients actually look for in your portfolio
Case Studies: Reviewing Best Portfolio Examples

button.span: Module 4 : Personal Branding to Get Clients on Autopilot

ul.li: Why personal branding is a game-changer for freelancers?
How to build your brand on Instagram & LinkedIn
What type of content should you post to attract clients?
How personal branding helps you charge more

button.span: Module 5 : Finding Clients – The Best Ways to Get Work

ul.li: Best platforms for freelancers (Upwork, Fiverr, Contra, etc.)
Finding clients by sending cold outreach (Mail, Instagram, LinkedIn)
Crafting cold outreach messages that actually work
How to get clients by attending networking events & meetups
How to build a strong network online & offline
BONUS - 5 stories of how I landed clients as a freelance - ?

button.span: Module 6 : Discovery Call & Payment Mastery (Best way to pitch your services)

ul.li: Setting up the first meeting
How to pitch a retainer deal
Crafting proposal that gets you the client
Setting right price as a freelancer
How to get clients to accept Your pricing
What are the payment structures in freelancing
How to create invoices without getting scammed Create Invoice
Step by step guide how to make money

div.span: From Our Students

I'm in my second year of college, and this course has been a game-changer! It gave me a clear roadmap to start freelancing while balancing my studies. The best part? I landed my first client within a month of implementing the strategies!
– Ananya Rana

No Fluff, Just Actionable Steps, I’ve watched tons of freelancing videos online, but nothing comes close to this course. It breaks down freelancing in a super simple way, with actual steps to get clients and make money. If you're serious about freelancing, don’t waste time elsewhere—just take this!
– Karan

I used to do part-time jobs for extra cash, but this course showed me that freelancing is way better. Now, I work on my own terms and earn more than I did working shifts at a café. If you want financial independence in college, this is the best place to start!
- Umang Sharma

Frequently Asked
Questions

Is this course suitable for students still in
college with no skill and prior experience?

div.p: Yes, this course is perfect for beginners with no prior experience.

div.span:
Will I be able to complete this
course along with my classes?

div.p: Yes the duration of the course is self paced. You can complete it at your own pace

div.span: Will I get a certificate after this course?

div.p: Yes, you’ll receive a certificate signed by Ayushman upon course completion.

div.span:
What if I have doubts and questions
during this course?

div.p: We provide monthly live sessions for doubt-solving

div.span:
Will I receive any templates, scripts, or
resources to help me start freelancing?

div.p: Yes, we provide ready-to-use templates, scripts, and resources.
